profile.about:
My mission is to create technological solutions that make people's daily lives easier and help businesses grow intelligently. I'm always looking to learn new tools, improve my web development skills, and collaborate with diverse and innovative teams.

Motivated by challenges, passionate about clean code and best practices, I believe that technology is a path to transforming realities — and I want to be part of that change.

experiences.company: Ministério Público do Rio de Janeiro

positions.title: Full Stack Development Intern
Systems Analysis and Development Associate's Degree | FAETERJ-Rio
NLW Pocket: Javascript - Intermediate Full-stack | Rocketseat
Endpoint Security | Cisco
positions.description: Extensive knowledge of network security fundamentals, as well as operating systems and endpoint security.

positions.title: Networking Basics | Cisco
positions.description: Knowledge of network types, how they work, how devices send and receive data, types of network cabling, how IP addresses find information on the Internet, how transport and applications operate, and practice building a home wireless network.

positions.title: Database Design | Oracle Academy
positions.description: Analyze complex business scenarios and create a data model—a conceptual representation of an organization's information. Examine data requirements and design a vendor-neutral relational database. Group collaboration and project management skills are developed as entity and relationship diagram models are completed. This course culminates in a project that challenges students to design a database solution for a business or organization.

positions.title: Network Defense | Cisco
positions.description: Extensive knowledge of network monitoring and protection techniques, including access control, firewalls, cloud security, and encryption. Also familiar with assessing and responding to security alerts.
